Header: Counter Insurgency Jungle Warfare Officer Course No 25 at ATS Begins
Content: The Counter Insurgency Jungle Warfare Officer Course No 25 which aims to enhance the knowledge on Counter Insurgency Operations, develop planning and enable decision-making skills, provide a foundation to improve concepts and techniques in warfare, and introduce the fundamentals of terrorism and counter terrorism in present context commenced recently at Maduruoya Army Training School 20 Army Officers, 03 Naval Officers, 01 Air Force Officer and 05 Foreign Officers are attending the Course. The opening address was delivered by the ATS Commandant Brigadier Senarath Niwunhella.
